link.title: Andrew Maier Elementary School - News

span.p: By order of Governor Wolf, April 9, 2020, all Pennsylvania Public Schools will remain closed until the end of the academic year. As a result, beginning Tuesday, April 14, 2020, all students will begin required online learning education, where learning continues through a series of structured activities that are teacher directed, student implemented and assessed for progress.

img.title: Congratulations to FAHS Student Council on receiving PASC Keystone Distinguished Student Council Award for the 2019 school year! This is our 5th year of receiving this top honor keep up all your hard work StuCo!

img.title: Congratulations to the 108 FBLA members that attended and competed in the regional competition. FAHS had 82 students place in the top 5 of their event, and of those, 61 students advanced to the state level of competition.

img.title: Congratulations to Robert Gore (8 years) and Gary Reinert (12 years) for their service as a School Director for the Fleetwood Area School District.

div.a: April Grab and Go Lunch Menu and Information

span.p: The FASD Grab and Go lunch distribution will be held Monday through Friday from 11:00 AM -12:30 PM at both Andrew Maier Elementary (bus drop off entrance) and the Fleetwood High School (auditorium entrance). The meals are provided free to children 18 years of age and younger. Students do not need to be present to receive meals. Please click here for April's Grab and Go lunch menu.
